attributes.action: A People’s Vote is a DEMOCRATIC NECESSITY given irregularities in the Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Insisting on bulldozing Brexit through come what May (pardon the pun!) because we had a thwarted Referendum is no reason to leave the EU. 
We had the cart put in for us in front of the horse! 
Government should have negotiated a DEAL FIRST; THEN ASK the people. 
Now that we really KNOW what the choices presented to us are, and the potential consequences of these choices, it is NOW that we should have a say via a clean, fairly conducted People’s Vote without the lies and fraudulent practices.
attributes.background:
We can’t leave the EU based on a Referendum conducted with no details of a deal; fraught with lies (e.g. £35m/wk for NHS) & fraudulent practices (as recognised by Electoral Commission). 
A People’s Vote is therefore an absolute democratic necessity!
